code:
journey
    title Customer Support Experience
    section Initial Contact
      Find help page: 3: Customer
      Search for answer: 2: Customer
      Click contact button: 4: Customer
    section Getting Help
      Fill out form: 2: Customer
      Wait for response: 1: Customer
      Receive reply: 4: Customer, Agent
    section Resolution
      Agent investigates: 3: Agent
      Solution provided: 5: Customer, Agent
      Problem resolved: 5: Customer

%%accTitle Customer Support Experience Journey
%%accDescr A user journey showing the customer's experience from initial contact through to problem resolution, tracking satisfaction at each step.
